Angelina Jolie joined four of her six children as they watched the US Election results in a captivating image from her new British Vogue shoot.

articles.author: Lisa Respers France, CNN
articles.title: Morgan Wallen apologizes for racial slur as backlash grows - CNN
articles.description: Morgan Wallen is apologizing after a video surfaced in which he reportedly used a racial slur and profanities.
